The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been viewed over 20,000 times.
The Hindi: language caption of the post translates to English as: "Tensions have started at the Ladakh border area, China is provoking India for a war."
Clashes between Chinese and Indian troop: s Ladakh region were reported in early May 2020, leading to heightened tensions between the two countries due to a longstanding border dispute.
